recipeIngredient.@value:
INGREDIENTS
					
5 ounces Black Butte Porter
5 ounces pre-packaged mocha
Ice cubes
Whipped cream

recipeInstructions.@value:
DIRECTIONS
					Build in a 16 ounce pint glass over ice cubes. Add mocha, Black Butte Porter, top with whipped cream, and serve with a straw. Cheers!
